## TOnPlotAttachChanged type

Listener for plot attach / detach to chart.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TOnPlotAttachChanged<TRenderer extends TUnknownRenderer> = TListener<"onPlotAttachChanged", TOnPlotAttachChangedArgs<TRenderer>>;
```
